title: Kandy – Colombo Expressway: Travel at 100 kmph; ADB gives US$ 500 m for first phase:
content: The travel time between Kandy and Colombo will be reduced to 50 minutes as a result of the elevated expressway linking the two cities spanning 98.9 km. It will be open to the public within four years. A vehicle travelling along the highly congested Kandy – Colombo road takes over three hours to complete the…
